DOC.brief_summary: Efficacy and Safety Study of MK0359 in Patients with Arthritis
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of MK0359 in Patients With Arthritis (0359-017)
DOC.criteria: You are 1865 years of age and have Rheumatoid Arthritis You must be able to read and understand patient questionnaires You have had certain types of surgery, certain types of cancer or history of Tuberculosis (TB) or HIV.
